pages.text: $(br)Using a $(key)Spell Container$() on $(mechanic/hostility#spell_trait)spell-trait$() $(bold)items$() converts them into school-specific $(key)damage reduction$(). While wearing it, the container consumes stored $(key)damage reduction$() to protect you from spell damage.
$(br)Each converted value matches the $(mage/power)Spell Power$() bonus a corresponding $(bold)max-level$() trait would give mobs.
